data.name: AccountConfirmationSmsBody
data.value: Su código de verificación para {0} es {1}

data.name: Email_Body_AccountConfirmationLine1
data.value: Para confirmar su email, por favor visite este vínculo:
data.comment: To confirm your email address, please visit this link:

data.name: Email_Body_AccountConfirmationSuccessfulLine1
data.value: Su dirección de correo ha sido confirmada exitosamente.
data.comment: Your email address has been confirmed successfully.

data.name: Email_Body_AccountConfirmationSuccessfulLine2
data.value: Usted puede ahora ingresar en la aplicación
data.comment: You can now sign into the application.

data.name: Email_Subject_PasswordReset
data.value: {{ ApplicationName }} - Su contraseña ha sido restabledida
data.comment: {{ ApplicationName }} - Your password has been reset

data.name: EtaMessageToDriver
data.value: El TEA mostrado al cliente es {0} y {1} min
data.comment: ETA displayed to client is {0} and {1} min

data.name: PaymentBeingProcessedMessageToDriver
data.comment: Payment being processed by the app...

data.name: OrderStatus_CabDriverNumberAssigned
data.value: El Vehículo {0} le ha sido asignado

data.name: OrderStatus_wosARRIVED
data.value: Su Taxi esta en la dirección de abordaje

data.name: OrderStatus_wosLOADEDAutoPairing
data.value: El costo de servicio sera pagado por el método de pago seleccionado
data.comment: Fare will be paid using the selected payment method

data.name: OrderStatus_wosNone
data.value: Confirmación inválida, por favor llame nuestro centro de despacho
data.comment: Invalid order, please call dispatch center

data.name: OrderStatus_wosTIMEOUT
data.value: Lo sentimos, no hay taxis disponibles dado una alta demanda, por favor intente nuevamente más tarde
data.comment: Sorry no cars are available due to high demand, please try later.

data.name: OrderStatus_wosWAITING
data.value: Espere mientras se le asigna un vehículo
data.comment: Waiting for driver to be assigned

data.name: PairingConfirmationToDriver
data.value: El costo será pagado a través de la aplicación
data.comment: Fare will be paid by the app

data.name: PayInCarMessageToDriver
data.value: El pago está siendo procesado a través de la aplicación
data.comment: Payment being processed by the app...

data.name: PaymentFailedToDriver
data.value: El pago por aplicación ha fallado!
data.comment: Payment by the app has Failed!

data.name: CannotCreateOrderInvalidVersion
data.value: The order cannot be created using this version of the app. Please upgrade the app to book a ride.

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_CreditCardWasDeclined
data.value: The order cannot be created because your credit card failed the preauthorization check.

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_PayPalWasDeclined
data.value: The order cannot be created because your PayPal account failed the preauthorization check.

data.name: PushNotification_ChangeNetworkCompany
data.value: Due to high demand, no cars are available right now. Do you want to book with {0} instead?

data.name: OrderStatus_wosWAITINGRoaming
data.value: Waiting for driver from {0} to be assigned

data.name: Network_CannotCreateOrder
data.value: There was a problem while trying to book with {0}. Your order will remain active.

data.name: PushNotification_NearbyTaxi
data.value: Su taxi casi ha llegado a su ubicación
data.comment: Your vehicle is almost at pickup location

data.name: PushNotification_OrderPairingFailed
data.comment: The ride #{0} could not be automatically paired

data.name: PushNotification_OrderPairingSuccessful
data.value: Su reservación#{0} sera cargada automáticamente al final del servicio usando su tarjeta con terminación en {1} y usando su propina especificada por defecto de {2}%
data.comment: The ride #{0} will be paid automatically at the end of the trip using your credit card ending with {1} and using your default tip of {2}%

data.name: PushNotification_OrderPairingSuccessfulUnpair
data.value: The ride #{0} will be paid at the end of the trip using your credit card on file ending with {1}. If you're in the wrong car, choose the Pay in Car option below to ensure you are not charged for the ride.

data.name: PushNotification_OrderPairingSuccessfulPayPal
data.value: The ride #{0} will be paid automatically at the end of the trip using your linked PayPal account and using your default tip of {1}%

data.name: PushNotification_OrderPairingSuccessfulPayPalUnpair
data.value: The ride #{0} will be paid at the end of the trip using your PayPal account. If you're in the wrong car, choose the Pay in Car option below to ensure you are not charged for the ride.

data.name: PushNotification_PaymentReceived
data.value: Su tarjeta de crédito ha sido cargada por un total de {0}. Este monto incluye tanto su servicio como su propina.
data.comment: Your credit card was successfully charged a total of {0}. This amount includes both fare and tip.

data.name: PushNotification_wosASSIGNED
data.value: El Taxi #{0} le ha sido asignado
data.comment: Taxi #{0} has been assigned to you

data.name: PushNotification_wosLOADED
data.value: Por favor confirme el vehículo para pagar con su tarjeta registrada en archivo.
data.comment: Please confirm vehicle to pay with card on file.

data.name: PushNotification_wosTIMEOUT
data.value: Lo sentimos, no hay taxis disponibles dado a una alta demanda, por favor intente nuevamente más tarde
data.comment: Sorry no cars are available due to high demand, please try later.

data.name: UnpairingConfirmationToDriver
data.value: The customer will be paying in the car at the end of the ride

data.name: CannotCreateOrderChargeAccountNotSupportedInRoaming
data.value: This account is not supported in a different market.
data.comment: This account is not supported in a different market.

data.name: CannotCreateOrderChargeAccountNotSupportedOnWeb
data.value: This account is not supported by the web site.

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_PromotionDoesNotExist
data.value: No existe promoción asociada a este código
data.comment: There is no promotion associated to this code

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_PromotionMustUseCardOnFile
data.value: You must select Card On File to use a promotion.
data.comment: You must select Card On File to use a promotion.

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_PromotionMustUseCardOnFileOrPayPal
data.value: Debe seleccionar la tarjeta de Pago o PayPal para utilizar una promoción.
data.comment: You must select Card On File or PayPal to use a promotion.

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_PromotionMustUsePayPal
data.value: Seleccionar PayPal para utilizar una promoción..
data.comment: You must select PayPal to use a promotion.

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_PromotionHasReachedMaxUsage
data.value: Se ha rebasado el máximo número de usos para esta promoción
data.comment: Maximum number of uses has been reached for this promotion

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_PromotionAppliesToCurrentBookingOnly
data.value: This promotion applies to current booking only
data.comment: This promotion applies to current booking only

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_PromotionAppliesToFutureBookingOnly
data.value: This promotion applies to future booking only
data.comment: This promotion applies to future booking only

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_PromotionNotAvailableForThisDayOfTheWeek
data.value: This promotion is not available for this day of the week
data.comment: This promotion is not available for this day of the week

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_PromotionNotStartedYet
data.value: This promotion has not started yet
data.comment: This promotion has not started yet

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_PromotionNotAvailableAtThisTime
data.value: Esta promoción no está disponible en este momento
data.comment: This promotion is not available at this time

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_NoCompanies
data.value: No hay empresa que sirve esta región

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_PromotionUserNotAllowed
data.value: No se le permite utilizar esta promoción

data.name: Email_Body_PromotionUnlockedLine1
data.value: Congratulations! You are now eligible to use the "{{ PromotionName }}" promotion. Use code {{ PromotionCode }} when booking your next ride to redeem it.

data.name: Email_Body_PromotionUnlockedLine2
data.value: This promotion is only valid until {{ ExpirationDate }} {{ ExpirationTime }}.

data.name: PushNotification_PromotionUnlocked
data.value: Congratulations! You are now eligible to use the "{0}" promotion. Use code {1} when booking your next ride to redeem it.

data.name: CreateOrder_CannotCreateInIbs
data.value: Su reservación no se pudo crear, por favor trate de nuevo o llámenos
data.comment: Order cannot be created. Please try again or call us.

data.name: CreateOrder_CannotCreateInIbs_1002
data.value: Su reservación no pudo ser creada. La dirección especificada está fuera de nuestra área de servicio. Por favor contáctenos para asistencia.
data.comment: Order cannot be created. The specified Pickup address lies outside the regular service area.

data.name: CreateOrder_CannotCreateInIbs_1452
data.value: Su reservación no pudo ser creada. La dirección de destino está fuera de nuestra área de servicio. Por favor contáctenos para asistencia.
data.comment: Order cannot be created. The specified Destination address lies outside the regular service area.

data.name: CreateOrder_CannotCreateInIbs_3000
data.comment: Order cannot be created. Your account has been disabled.

data.name: CreateOrder_CannotCreateInIbs_7000
data.value: Su reservación no puede ser creada porque su cuenta está inactiva
data.comment: Order cannot be created. Your account is currently inactive.

data.name: CreateOrder_CannotCreateInIbs_10000
data.value: La información de su cuenta es inválida. Por favor intente nuevamente.
data.comment: Order cannot be created. The charge account information is invalid. Please try again.

data.name: CreateOrder_CannotCreateInIbs_1300
data.value: We apologize but unfortunately we do not have any reservations available for that time period.
data.comment: We apologize but unfortunately we do not have any reservations available for that time period.

data.name: ServiceErrorCreateAccount_AccountAlreadyExist
data.value: Este email está registrado y en uso en nuestro sistema
data.comment: This email is already in use.

data.name: ServiceErrorCreateOrder_CardOnFileButNoCreditCard
data.value: No tiene Tarjeta de Crédito Registrada en Archivo

data.name: ServiceErrorCreateOrder_InvalidProvider
data.value: Su reservación no se pudo crear, proveedor inválido. Por favor contacte {0} al {1} para asistencia
data.comment: Order cannot be created, invalid provider. Please contact {0} at {1} for further assistance.

data.name: ServiceErrorCreateOrder_InvalidProvider_NoCall
data.value: Su reservación no se pudo crear, proveedor inválido
data.comment: Order cannot be created, invalid provider.

data.name: ServiceErrorCreateOrder_NoFareEstimateAvailable
data.value: No podemos proveer costo estimado de viaje, por favor contacte {0} al {1} para asistencia
data.comment: No fare estimate available for the ride. Please contact {0} at {1} for further assistance.

data.name: ServiceErrorCreateOrder_NoFareEstimateAvailable_NoCall
data.value: No podemos proveer costo estimado para su viaje
data.comment: No fare estimate available for the ride.

data.name: ServiceErrorCreateOrder_NoProvider
data.value: Su reservación no se pudo crear, no se especificó proveedor, por favor trate de nuevo o llámenos
data.comment: Order cannot be created, no provider specified. Please try again or call us.

data.name: ServiceErrorCreateOrder_VehiculeType
data.value: Su reservación no se pudo crear, tipo de vehículo inválido. Por favor inténtelo nuevamente o llámenos
data.comment: Order cannot be created, invalid vehicle type. Please try again or call us.

data.name: ServiceErrorDefaultMessage
data.value: Un error ha ocurrido, por favor inténtelo nuevamente
data.comment: An error occurred. Please try again.

data.name: ServiceErrorUnauthorized
data.value: Su sesión ha expirado, por favor re-inicie sesión para continuar
data.comment: Your session has expired, please login to continue.

data.name: ServiceErrorUpdatePassword_NotSame
data.comment: The current password is not valid.

data.name: ServiceError_ErrorCreatingOrderMessage
data.value: Por favor contacte a {0} al {1} para asistencia
data.comment: Please contact {0} at {1} for further assistance.

data.name: ServiceError_ErrorCreatingOrderMessage_NoCall
data.value: Su reservación no puede ser creada

data.name: PushNotification_OrderUnpairingTimeOutWarning
data.value: Reminder: If you're in the wrong car, choose the Pay in Car option below to ensure you are not charged for the ride.

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_CreditCardDeactivated
data.value: Your card on file was deactivated because the payment of your last ride was declined. To be able to use it again, go to the Payment screen to settle any overdue payment

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_CreditCardExpired
data.value: Your card on file has expired. Please update your payment information to continue using it.

data.name: Email_Body_CreditCardDeactivatedLine
data.value: Su tarjeta de crédito {{ CreditCardCompany }} con termiación en {{ Last4Digits }} ha sido desactivada debido a que el pago de su ultimo servicio fue declinado. Para poder utilizarla nuevamente, abra la aplicación {{ ApplicationName }} en su teléfono y acceda a la pantalla de Pago para efectuar el pago adeudado.
data.comment: Your {{ CreditCardCompany }} credit card ending by {{ Last4Digits }} has been deactivated because the payment of your last ride was declined. To be able to use it again, open {{ ApplicationName }} on your smart phone and go to the Payment screen to settle any overdue payment.

data.name: Email_Subject_CreditCardDeactivated
data.value: {{ ApplicationName }} - Su tarjeta de crédito se ha desactivado como forma de pago
data.comment: {{ ApplicationName }} - Your credit card has been deactivated

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_PrepaidNoEstimate
data.value: You need an estimated fare to prepay your ride. Please select a destination address to get one.

data.name: CannotCreateOrder_PrepaidButPrepaidNotEnabled
data.value: Payment is not enabled on the website. Please select another charge type.

data.name: ManualRideLinq_NoCardOnFile
data.value: You need to have a card on file to pair with RideLinQ

data.name: Email_Body_AccountConfirmationRedirectLine1
data.value: If your browser does not automatically redirect you after 10 seconds,

data.name: ManualRideLinq_CreditCardDisabled
data.value: Your current card on file has an overdue payment for a previous ride. This overdue payment is preventing you from pairing with RideLinQ

data.name: Email_Body_CancellationFee
data.value: You have been charged a fee of {{FeeAmount}} for the ride #{{IbsOrderId}} because it was cancelled.

data.name: Email_Body_NoShowFee
data.value: You have been charged a fee of {{FeeAmount}} for the ride #{{IbsOrderId}} because you were absent when the driver tried to pick you up at {{PickUpAddress}}.

data.name: Email_Body_Fee_Conclusion
data.value: This amount will be automatically debited from your credit card ending with {{Last4Digits}}.

data.name: OrderStatus_PairingFailed
data.value: Unable to pair. Please pay to your driver at the end of the ride

data.name: OrderStatus_PairingSuccess
data.value: OK you're checked in. Payment will be automatic at the end of your trip.

data.value: The phone number is invalid. It must have format {0}

data.value: This email is already used by another account

data.value: Cannot change the email of an account linked with Facebook

data.value: It is too late to cancel this order

data.value: Sorry, there was a problem, please pay in the taxi

data.value: Sorry, your card could not be authorized. Please pay in the taxi
